system.description:
At 14th level, while you realize that you will never be free of your artifact’s curse, you are so accustomed to it that attempts to make it worse skate off of you. You gain one of the following benefits based on your chosen affliction:

  • Unmoored: You are immune to the Confused condition.
  • Paranoid: You are immune to the Frightened condition.
  • Troubled: You cannot be put to sleep magically and you are immune to being harmed or terrorized in your dreams (such as with the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jo2vztvypvhqxh5u]{Dream} spell). You also ignore the effects of having one level of fatigue, though if you gain a second, both (and any additional) levels affect you normally.
  • Fettered: You are immune to the Slowed condition.
  • Gravebound: If you are killed, a spellcaster does not have to spend material component costs to raise you from the dead with @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.0k5zymq9q95l8jwa]{Revivify}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.9zhsri19dkhm9mcf]{Raise Dead}, or similar magic.
